name: Downward Momentum
description:
The cats have run out of fish in the sea! To combat this epidemic they have created a training ground for the skillful catching of the lesser understood Sky Tuna. They have captured countless mice to be used for the QA team during this beta test. How many fish can the testers get before they fall to their peril? Can the cats actually eat Sky Tuna?

Ground - WASD for movement (to enter cannon walk up to it)

Cannon Controls: AD move cannon base, WS move cannon, space to shoot

Flying: W to use fuel, mouse to steer

Gather flying  fish to refuel yourself while beating everyone else's score!

If you drop below the start platform without fuel you will die and the game will restart.
